thread.title: WATCH: Force India reveal new car
thread.title_full: WATCH: Force India reveal new car

title: WATCH: Force India reveal new car
text:
WATCH: Force India launch their 2017 F1 car Sergio Perez and Esteban Ocon pull the wraps off the VJM10... Last Updated: 22/02/17 4:18pm Force India drivers Sergio Perez and Esteban Ocon unveil the teams car for the 2017 F1 season, the VJM10. Watch the footage as Force India revealed their 2017 car, the VJM10. 
The team, reckoned to be the best 'pound for pound' outfit in the sport, launched their new challenger in a showcase event at Silverstone hosted by Sky F1's Natalie Pinkham and David Croft. 
Force India drivers Sergio Perez and new recruit Esteban Ocon, hired as a replacement for the outgoing Nico Hulkenberg, took the wraps off the car . 
"I trust totally this team. I expect a very big year for the team," said Perez. At the unveiling of their 2017 car, Force India's Sergio Perez reveals that the step up in speed in F1 this year is similar to that of GP2 
The launch was broadcast live on Sky Sports News HQ and across the Sky F1 Digital platforms.
